arcade.core.sim.output

Class OutputLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.sim.output.OutputLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchOutputLoader, PottsOutputLoader

    public abstract class OutputLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom loader for deserializing objects from JSON.

    The loader is associated with an implementation-specific Gson instance that defines deserialization of implementation-specific classes. The associated Series instance provides any static series-specific information needed for loading. The equipped Simulation instance is called to get the random seed (if needed) to select the correct files to load. The tag [#] in the load path is replaced with the random seed of the simulation instance.
